original_text: And said, For this cause shall a man leave father and mother, and shall cleave to his wife: and they twain shall be one flesh?
korean_text: 말씀하시기를 그러므로 사람이 그 부모를 떠나서 아내에게 합하여 그 둘이 한 몸이 될지니라 하신 것을 읽지 못하였느냐

sentences.original_text: shall a man leave father and mother
and shall cleave to his wife
and they twain shall be one flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘이 한 몸이 될 것이라
